replies.body: I would like the badges to be somewhat similar to prestiges. In this, I mean you would start out with the first, least-expensive badge, then you could purchase an upgrade for whatever cost your current badge needs to have added to it to become as expensive as the second badge (SecondBadge-UpgradeCost=FirstBadge). I find this to be a bit of a better way to see the players' actual progress from an XP standpoint because of how they're more likely to immediately purchase an upgrade instead of waiting and building up for the most expensive badge.
